description: SplunkForwarder is the Schema for the splunkforwarders API

apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object. Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and may reject unrecognized values. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents. Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to. Cannot be updated. In CamelCase. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

spec.description: SplunkForwarderSpec defines the desired state of SplunkForwarder

clusterID.description: Unique cluster name. Optional: Looked up on the cluster if not provided, default to openshift

filters.description: List of additional filters supplied to configure the Splunk Heavy Forwarder Optional: Defaults to no additional filters (no transforms.conf).

items.description: SplunkFilter is the struct that configures Splunk Heavy Forwarder filters.

filter.description: Routing criteria regex for the filter to match on.

name.description: Name of the filter, will be prepended with "filter_".

heavyForwarderDigest.description: Container image digest of the container image defined in HeavyForwarderImage. Optional: Defaults to latest

heavyForwarderImage.description: Container image path to the Splunk Heavy Forwarder image. Required when UseHeavyForwarder is true.

heavyForwarderReplicas.description: Number of desired Splunk Heavy Forwarder pods. Optional: Defaults to 2

heavyForwarderSelector.description: Specifies the value of the NodeSelector for the Splunk Heavy Forwarder pods with key: "node-role.kubernetes.io" Optional: Defaults to an empty value.

image.description: Container image path to the Splunk Forwarder

imageDigest.description: Container image digest of the Splunk Forwarder image. Has precedence and is recommended over ImageTag. Optional: Defaults to latest

imageTag.description: The container image tag of the Splunk Forwarder image. Is not used if ImageDigest is supplied. Optional: Defaults to latest

items.description: SplunkForwarderInputs is the struct that defines all the splunk inputs

blackList.description: Regex to exclude certain files from monitoring. Multiple regex rules may be specified separated by "|" (OR) Optional: Defaults to monitoring all files in the specified Path

index.description: Repository for data. More info: https://docs.splunk.com/Splexicon:Index Optional: Defaults to "main"

path.description: Required: Filepath for Splunk to monitor.

sourceType.description: Data structure of the event. More info: https://docs.splunk.com/Splexicon:Sourcetype Optional: Defaults to "_json"

whiteList.description: Regex to monitor certain files. Multiple regex rules may be specified separated by "|" (OR) Optional: Defaults to monitoring all files in the specified Path

splunkLicenseAccepted.description: Adds an --accept-license flag to automatically accept the Splunk License Agreement. Must be true for the Red Hat provided Splunk Forwarder image. Optional: Defaults to false.

useHeavyForwarder.description: Whether an additional Splunk Heavy Forwarder should be deployed. Optional: Defaults to false.

status.description: SplunkForwarderStatus defines the observed state of SplunkForwarder
